page.title: 15The Indian Community
page.content: The largest minority group in the area are Indians.The Sikhs have a temple containing their holy scriptures the Guru Grantsahib.There is no local Hindu temple.Hindu families have a shrine at home containing images of their gods and goddesses.Every day the shrine is decorated with flowers and sweet smelling perfume sticks.The gods are offered food which has been prepared for the family,the food is then said to be blessed and is eaten for the family meal.Indian foods are hot and spicy and usually consist of chicken curry and rice,beef and pork are not usually eaten.The puddings are very sweet.Hindu and Sikh women wear sarees,Hindu men have a dhoti,a white garment.Sikh men have a turban to dress their hair and wear a bracelet and comb,a knife is carried.
